scripts.build: npm run build:common && npm run build:common-node && npm run build:client && npm run build:rarities && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: (cd ./packages/client && npm run build) && (cd ../../ && npm run publish:client)
scripts.clean: npm run clean:web && npm run clean:client && npm run clean:client-data && npm run clean:common && npm run clean:common-node
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:common" "npm run start:common-node" "npm run start:client" "npm run start:server"
scripts.start:rarities: npm run build:common-node && npm run build:rarities && copyfiles -u 2 ./web/data/**/* ./packages/client/public/data
scripts.start:client: npm run start:rarities && cd ./packages/client && npm start
